snippet.title: Notes Ban: Can Banking Reach Those Furthest From It?

localized.description:
If the poorest workers in the country, those who come under the employment guarantee scheme are paid in their Jan Dhan bank accounts, then why can't other sectors also evolve? Thats what the government says. But in the tea gardens of Assam, shifting to a system that works out of banks is easier said than done

Watch more videos: http://www.ndtv.com/video?yt
